title: Add support of HTTP Live streaming protocol in the media player
body: HLS becomes more and more popular to stream live video contents on  mobile devices. Is there any plan to support this protocol in WP? If not, what is the recommended solution.

comments.body:
Please add this functionality. It is kind of a must have a this point. There is a very expensive 3rd-Party tool that does this, but it is not practical for the small developer to pay what it costs.
http://www.3ivx.com/technology/windows/metro/http_live_streaming.html
